problems.title: Calculate Tax Based on Income
problems.description:
Calculate tax based on annual income using the following slabs:
- Income <= 250000: No tax (0%)
- Income 250001-500000: 5% tax on amount above 250000
- Income 500001-1000000: ₹12500 + 20% on amount above 500000
- Income > 1000000: ₹112500 + 30% on amount above 1000000

Print the tax amount.

Input Format:
Single integer representing annual income.

Output Format:
Print the tax amount.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
300000

Sample Output
2500

Sample Input
700000

Sample Output
52500

Sample Input
2000000

Sample Output
412500

Explanation:
Use if-else if ladder to calculate tax for each income slab.
For 300000: (300000 - 250000) * 5% = 2500
hintsList: Use if-else if ladder: if income <= 250000 (0), else if <= 500000 (5% of excess), else if <= 1000000 (12500 + 20% of excess), else (112500 + 30% of excess).
